pageContext.claim: “The statement was made: ‘This is bigger than healthcare.’ And I think it will be. I think it'll be more meaningful, in many ways. You'll save so much money and you'll get the care that you want, and you'll choose the doctor you want, which was not possible despite the many pleas.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump exaggerates what experts say will be a modest effect from an executive order he signed requiring hospitals to disclose more of their costs.
